name.ja: <ruby>青眼の究極霊竜<rt>ブルーアイズ・スピリット・アルティメットドラゴン</rt></ruby>

text.en:
2+ Tuners + 1 non-Tuner "Blue-Eyes" monster
Your opponent cannot banish cards from your GY. You can only use each of the following effects of "Blue-Eyes Spirit Ultimate Dragon" once per turn. When a card or effect is activated on the field (Quick Effect): You can negate the activation, and if you do, this card gains 1000 ATK until the end of this turn. If this card is destroyed by battle or card effect: You can Special Summon 1 LIGHT Dragon monster from your GY, except "Blue-Eyes Spirit Ultimate Dragon".

ja.set_name: Structure Deck: Advent of the Eyes of Blue
